column5: Programme descriptionThis comprehensive programme allows you to take full advantage of the breadth of our research expertise.On this programme we will help you to:develop a specialised knowledge and understanding of history and its central issuesexamine historical sourcesevaluate existing researchwork towards a specialised research project of your own.Taught by one of the largest groups of historians in any British university, you will encounter a stimulating environment in which to further your interest in practically any era of history and many regions of the world.
